meanings.definition: A boat used for work or commercial purposes.
meanings.sent1: The workboat carried supplies to the construction site.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen relied on the workboat to bring in their catch.
meanings.sent3: The workboat and its crew battled rough waters to deliver the cargo.
meanings.sent4: The workboat was a sturdy vessel in the vast ocean of tasks.
meanings.sent5: The bright red workboat stood out against the blue sea, a symbol of hard work.

meanings.definition: To operate or use a workboat for a specific task.
meanings.sent1: They workboat every day to transport goods along the river.
meanings.sent2: She will workboat the vessel to transport tourists around the bay.
meanings.sent3: He workboats with precision, ensuring the cargo reaches its destination safely.
meanings.sent4: The team workboated through the storm, showing great skill and determination.
meanings.sent5: In his dream, he workboated through the sky, carrying dreams and hopes to far-off lands.
